# [Interview #1088: WoR Signing Report - Argent, Entry #23](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1088#23)

#### Question

Will Nightblood drain Stormlight?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Nightblood will drain any Investiture, so yes.
